overview.description: Articulation allows to display a summary of a roundabout information in the interviewer app, so that they know which person have already answered, and directly access the page of the respondent they will interview.

error.formulaNotVtl: Articulation is available only to questionnaires in VTL
error.roundaboutNotFound: Articulation is available only to questionnaires with a roundabout

overview.howToUse: These rules may be specified in VTL to compute values from collected data that will be displayed in the interviewer app.
overview.title: Articulation
overview.versionNoArticulation: Articulation has not been specified in this version.

delete.dialogConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the articulation?

form.mustProvideFirstName: You must provide a formula for first name
form.mustProvideGender: You must provide a formula for gender
form.mustProvideAge: You must provide a formula for age
